snippet: The gift from David H. Koch is for a complete overhaul of the National Museum of Natural History's dinosaur hall.
abstract: The gift from David H. Koch is for a complete overhaul of the National Museum of Natural History's dinosaur hall.

headline.main: Koch Gives $35 Million to Smithsonian Natural History Museum
headline.print_headline: Giant Reptiles Receive $35 Million for Makeover
